definitions.text: not widely known; especially valued for its uncommonness

examples: rare patches of green in the desert
lightheaded from the rarefied mountain air

definitions.text: marked by an uncommon quality; especially superlative or extreme of its kind; -J.R.Lowell
examples: what is so rare as a day in June
she was kind to an uncommon degree

definitions.text: (of meat) cooked a short time; still red inside
